items.name: Shaper's Touch
implicitMods: Attacks have +0.74% to Critical Strike Chance
explicitMods: 84% increased Armour and Energy Shield
+4 Accuracy Rating per 2 Intelligence
+1 Life per 4 Dexterity
+1 Mana per 4 Strength
1% increased Energy Shield per 10 Strength
2% increased Evasion Rating per 10 Intelligence
2% increased Melee Physical Damage per 10 Dexterity
flavourText: By my hand, the inert is given life.
By my hand, that which rots is reborn.
There is nothing that cannot be changed.
Nothing.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses a single enemy, increasing the damage they take from projectiles, and making projectiles split when hitting them, to hit other targets around them. You can only have one Mark at a time.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies take 41% increased Damage from Projectile Hits
Projectiles which Hit Cursed Enemies Split towards 5 additional targets

properties.name: Attack, AoE, Chaos, Duration, Projectile, Bow

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fire arrows into the air that rain down around the targeted area, dealing damage to enemies they hit and creating spore pods where they land. Each spore pod deals chaos damage over time to nearby enemies and slows their movement speed. The pods last for a duration before bursting, dealing area damage.
explicitMods: Deals 7.9 Base Chaos Damage per second
Base duration is 1.00 seconds
Fires 4 additional Arrows
60% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Modifiers to Projectile Damage apply to this Skill's Damage Over Time effect
10% increased Area of Effect
Each Spore Pod applies 5% less Movement Speed to nearby Enemies, to a maximum of 30%
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fires arrows up in the air, to rain down in an area. Each arrow deals area damage around where it lands, and they will all overlap on the targeted location.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fires an arrow that remains in the ground behind its final target, tethering that enemy to it. Ensnared enemies always count as moving, and have less movement speed while trying to break the snare. The snare will break if they leave the area of effect.
explicitMods: 10% increased Attack Speed
Ensnared Enemies take 15% increased Projectile Damage from Attack Hits
Each Snare applies 40% less Movement Speed to Normal or Magic Enemies
Each Snare applies 30% less Movement Speed to Rare Enemies
Each Snare applies 25% less Movement Speed to Unique Enemies
Maximum 3 Snares per Enemy
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Throws a trap that damages and immobilises a single enemy for a duration based on how much damage was dealt. After the immobilise expires, a debuff remains on the enemy for a duration, lowering their movement speed by an amount which lessens over time. The affected enemy will take increased damage from traps and mines until the debuff expires. Modifiers to spell damage do not affect this skill's damage.
explicitMods: Deals 1447 to 2026 Physical Damage
Traps do not Trigger at the end of their Duration
Trap lasts 4 seconds
Base duration is 3.00 seconds
Locks enemy in place
Enemies take 25% increased Damage from Trap or Mine Hits
Enemies have 80% less Movement Speed when the Debuff starts
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

implicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems

explicitMods: +23 to maximum Life
10% reduced Mine Throwing Speed
Mines have 42% increased Detonation Speed

Skills which throw Mines throw up to 1 additional Mine if you have at least 800 Intelligence
flavourText: Sing with me one last duet,
the curtain closes nigh.
Join me in a quiet song,
Before we all must die.
